sub_title: Clinical & Medical Hypnotherapist and Business Coach at Mind Awareness
summary:
Fabio Ortiz is a Board Certified Hypnosis Consultant and Master Practitioner of Neuro Linguistics Programming (NLP). Over the past 20 years, he has been privileged to have been trained by some of the best in these fields including Richard Bandler and John Grinder (the founders of NLP), Roy Hunter (Parts and Regression to Cause) and Jerry Kind (Hypnotherapy). 

Prior to working in the field of Hypnosis and NLP, Fabio has over 10 years of business experience working in large multinational organisations, small businesses and start-up companies in Europe and Australia. Having experienced first-hand the challenges of corporate and business life, Fabio is able to work with corporations and their employees to coach senior sales professionals or improve employee motivation and productivity. 

Fabio is passionate about human behavior and by focusing on mind training, people are able achieve what's 'not possible' to exceed their limitations and enrich their lives.

projects.title: Hypnodontics - dental implant with no anasthesia
projects.description: A video testimonial of a dental procedure using no anesthetic - showing what mind training can do to achieve what is thought not possible.

contributors.headline: Clinical & Medical Hypnotherapist and Business Coach at Mind Awareness

profile_positions.description:
Fabio is a skilled practitioner and trainer who works with clients on an individual or group basis to help them tackle fears and anxieties or break habits and behaviors holding them back. Founder of Mind Awareness in Singapore, Fabio's aim is to utilize his experience in Hypnosis, Neurolinguistics Programming and Coaching to assist individuals and corporations with mind training. 

Fabio recognizes that people already have many of the resources within themselves to navigate their lives, but sometimes they are held back by their belief structures and old habits - limiting their personal performance.

Rather than focusing on problems, Fabio works with people to identify their skills and strengths and to modify and improve their mental models to create lasting and positive changes. This is a concept he calls Mind Training.
profile_positions.title: Clinical & Medical Hypnotherapist and Business Coach

profile_positions.description:
Fabio spent 3 years in Miami Florida, working from the Gables Optimal Health clinic where he successfully worked with clients to achieve their personal goals. During this time he focused on Clinical and Medical Hypnotherapy with a keen interest in pain management. He aligned with Sharp Dentistry to provide clients with alternatives to anesthesia for dental procedures and successfully applied self hypnosis on his own dental implant surgery. 

In addition to developing pain management techniques, he continued to help people in the following areas:

•	Break Habits – Stop Smoking, Over-Eating, Nail Biting
•	Change Beliefs Structures – Remove negative self talk, improve confidence
•	Improve Communication – Understand others, Communicate your ideas or concepts effectively
•	Group Relaxation Sessions – to help you deal with the daily stress of work and life
•	Coaching – Tools to help you improve your performance, motivation, achieve your goals 
 
“I believe everyone has the potential for great success and my goal is to help you look inside and provide you with the tools and resources to empower you on your path to greatness.”
profile_positions.title: Clinical & Medical Hypnotherapist & NLP Practitioner
